meta.label: Clear SnowparkML Registry models
meta.description: Delete models from SnowparkML Model Registry if the Dataiku Saved Model (or a version underneath) was deleted

params.name: perform_deletion
params.label: Perform deletion
params.description: If not checked, only lists what will be deleted

params.name: snowflake_connection
params.label: Snowflake Connection
params.description: Snowflake connection where models are stored (in the MODEL_REGISTRY database)
